page.title: 07Events in Priors Marston
page.content: {Carnival Procession}(theme this year - peace) was extended to celebrate the 40th anniversary of V.E.Day. There was a service of thanksgiving, children's tea party, an exhibition of 1945 memorabilia and a 1940's dance. { Competetive}annual events include - {Fun Run}(2.5 miles) open to sprinters, joggers & walkers aged 4 to 74+;{Horse {& Pony}Show;{Flower & Vegetable}Show; Priors Marston First{School Sports Day In January our new Priest-in-Charge was{commissioned}by the Bishop of Coventry. All denominations were represented at the{Women's World Day {of Prayer}Service. The Parish{Church {Fete}was held on a sunny June day, providing much fun & finance. Other{fund-raisers}included coffee mornings, afternoon teas, gardeners' question time, quizzes, Moravian Church garden party, Christmas fayre.
